posts.post_title: WTB: Ed Walsh, Eddie Collins and Nap Lajoie lower grade
posts.post_content:
Looking for any of the three cards aforementioned with any back. 

Seeking a grade between PSA 1-3 or raw between those grades. Not looking for one with major creasing. 

Thanks.
